titles.title: To provide for an additional temporary extension of programs under the Small Business Act and the Small Business Investment Act of 1958, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Ms. Velazquez moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 1541.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 3/20/2009--Public Law. Extends through July 31, 2009, under the same terms and conditions, the authorization for any program, authority, or provision, including any pilot program, that is currently authorized through March 20, 2009, under the Small Business Act or the Small Business Investment Act of 1958.
